column5: Newly remodeled 1b/1b in Long Island Village Outdoor Resort. Family-friendly with lots of amenities like tennis, sand volleyball, billiards room, mini-golf and golf, and indoor and outdoor pools and hot tubs! Minutes away from South Padre Island.  LIV Resort charges a $20 fee for overnight guests due at the time of registration. This is not a renter's fee.
column8: Cozy Getaway in Outdoor Resort Minutes from SPI!
